name: Santa'sHelper
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa's helper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Santa's Helper puts you in charge of Santa's Workshop in the lead up to Christmas. You'll be confronted with a wide variety of festive choices and have to balance the morale of the elves and the output of the workshop to save Christmas!

Santa's Helper is part of Voice Arcade. To discover the entire collection just ask Alexa to "open Voice Arcade" or visit our website at https://www.voicearcade.com


WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!
-------------------------------------
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions please let us know at hi@voicearcade.com and we’ll get straight back to you!
